forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the night wraps around the city cloaked in a blanket of clouds, a soft embrace that brings a hint of coolness, resting gently at around fifty-four degrees. The night breeze whispers secrets as it travels from the southwest at thirteen miles per hour, inviting passersby to wear a light jacket or layer. As dawn approaches, the promise of a mostly sunny Wednesday unfolds, bringing a mild high of sixty-four. By afternoon, temperatures will settle into a more moderate sixty-one, tempered by the playful gusts of the west-southwest winds, reaching up to twenty-one miles per hour and accompanied by even stronger bursts that might rustle the leaves and tousle hair.

The morning light will reveal the city draped in an ethereal sheen, yet hints of fog may linger on the edges, softening the skyline where the Golden Gate Bridge meets the horizon. Those venturing out may find it invigorating to stroll through the parks, or perhaps enjoy a quiet moment with a warm beverage at their favorite outdoor café. The delicate interplay of light and shadow promises a day that feels both refreshing and rejuvenating, a perfect backdrop for reflective walks or casual outings—ideal for savoring the gentle rhythm of life in this coastal gem.
